props.name: duration
props.description: Time in milliseconds that each toast should remain visible for.

props.name: label
props.description: An author-localized label for each toast. Used to help screen reader users associate the interruption with a toast.

props.name: swipeDirection
props.description: Direction of pointer swipe that should close the toast.

props.name: swipeThreshold
props.description: Distance in pixels that the swipe must pass before a close is triggered.
